file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 30-41-01-04 - WINDSHIELD WIPER CONTROL BOX - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL WINDSHIELD WIPER CONTROL BOX - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH WINDSHIELD WIPER CONTROL BOX 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the control box of the wiper system. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH WINDSHIELD WIPER 30-41-01-000-801-A CONTROL BOX - REMOVAL CONTROL BOX AIRCRAFT WITH WINDSHIELD WIPER 30-41-01-400-801-A CONTROL BOX - INSTALLATION CONTROL BOX EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 30-41-01 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 30-41-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH WINDSHIELD WIPER CONTROL BOX 2. CONTROL BOX - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the control box of the wiper system. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 113 113AZ Nose landing gear compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Nose landing gear compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the Overhead Circuit Breaker Panel, open the circuit breakers below and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to them. • WIPER 1 (Location tip: DC BUS 1/ICE AND RAIN PROTECTION/WIPER 1). • WIPER 2 (Location tip: DC BUS 2/ICE AND RAIN PROTECTION/WIPER 2). (2) Open access panel 113AZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Disconnect the four electrical connectors (2). (2) Remove the four screws (4) and washers (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 30-41-01 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Remove the control box (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 30-41-01 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH WINDSHIELD WIPER CONTROL BOX Control Box of the Wiper System - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ACCESS PANEL 113AZ 1. CONTROL BOX 2. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR (4) 4. SCREW (4) DET. A 3. WASHER (4) 145AMM300009.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 30-41-01 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 30-41-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH WINDSHIELD WIPER CONTROL BOX 3. CONTROL BOX - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the control box of the wiper system. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - WINDSHIELD WIPER SYSTEM - OPERATIONAL AMM TASK 30-41-00-700-801-A/500 TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 113 113AZ Nose landing gear compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Nose landing gear compartment I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the control box (1) in its installation position. (2) Install the four screws (4) and washers (3). (3) Connect the four electrical connectors (2). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers below and remove the tags DO- NOT-CLOSE from them. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 30-41-01 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL • WIPER 1 (Location tip: DC BUS 1/ICE AND RAIN PROTECTION/WIPER 1). • WIPER 2 (Location tip: DC BUS 2/ICE AND RAIN PROTECTION/WIPER 2). (2) Do an operational test of the windshield wiper system ( AMM TASK 30-41-00-700-801- A/500). (3) Close access panel 113AZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100).
